# XmlDocumentExtensions.OptimizeNamespaces method

Efficiently optimizes namespaces by removing redundant and unnecessary declarations.

```csharp
public static XmlDocument OptimizeNamespaces(this XmlDocument @this)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| this | The XmlDocument to optimize namespaces for. |

## Return Value

The input XmlDocument instance.

## Remarks

Namespaces will not be moved, and prefixes will be preserved and honored.
